channel.title: Spells
channel.description: I'm currently trying to add Storm of armadyl and i'm trying to make it use the arma runes, that the staff would make the spell more Op'ed and faster and to make the replacement spell have it's logo(icon). If anyone knows how to make it without replacing a spell please tell me! All responses and explanations are greatly appreciated. If you got a tut, snip or you can even spoonfeed me that's even better! Thank you

item.title: Spells

item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

I’m currently trying to add Storm of armadyl and i’m trying to make it use the arma runes, that the staff would make the spell more Op’ed and faster and to make the replacement spell have it’s logo(icon). If anyone knows how to make it without replacing a spell please tell me!
All responses and explanations are greatly appreciated. If you got a tut, snip or you can even spoonfeed me that’s even better!
Thank you
